<xs:element name="external-data-reference" type="tns:external-data-reference"/> <xs:complexType name="external-data-reference"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="data-reference" type="tns:data-reference"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="profile" type="tns:gb-profile"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="data-reference"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="lifetime"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creationTime" type="tns:datetimeType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="expirationTime" type="tns:datetimeType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="content"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="filename" type="xs:NCName"/> <xs:element name="checksum" type="tns:checksumType"/> <xs:element name="size" type="xs:unsignedLong"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="contentType" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="transport"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="location"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="senderUrl" type="tns:urlType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="receiverUrl" type="tns:urlType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="contextId" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="datetimeType"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:anySimpleType"> <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="checksumType"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="tns:md5String"> <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="md5String"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="tns:anyString"/> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="anyString"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="urlType"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="tns:anyString"> <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:anySimpleType" use="required"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="gb-profile"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="digikoppeling-gb-1.0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://luin.dev/digikoppeling/gb/client/1.0" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://luin.dev/digikoppeling/gb/client/1.0" xmlns:ns1="http://www.logius.nl/digikoppeling/gb/2010/10"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.logius.nl/digikoppeling/gb/2010/10"/> <xs:element name="getExternalDataReference" type="tns:getExternalDataReference"/> <xs:element name="getExternalDataReferenceResponse" type="tns:getExternalDataReferenceResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="getExternalDataReference"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="getExternalDataReferenceResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="ns1:external-data-reference"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="GBServiceException" type="tns:GBServiceException"/> <xs:complexType name="GBServiceException"> <xs:sequence> name="GBServiceException"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getExternalDataReference"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:getExternalDataReference" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message>
